title.rendered: The best websites about veganism and vegan food stores

content.rendered:
If you are curious about this way of life, you want to know more about its ethical principles, how dependence on animal products is avoided or any other detail about veganism, these are some of the best vegan websites and stores that you will find on the Internet.

Best websites about veganism

With the vegan community growing more and more, it is normal that those who are part of this lifestyle are encouraged to share it with other Internet users. Here are some interesting websites about veganism.

Begin Vegan Begun

This is Aida’s blog, which has become a reference for finding vegan recipes and all kinds of ideas for eating vegan and “showing that you can make delicious things with little more than wanting to do it, giving ideas and It is true that it also demonstrates to one or another that I don’t only eat lettuce, much less ‘I live on a diet’».

This Asturian based in Madrid shares her creations, ideas and culinary experiments with great affection. You can also see how good she is at cooking in her video recipes.

veganism websites

A Vegan around the World

Jenny is a vegan girl at heart with a traveling soul. So on her blog you can follow her to all corners of the planet and discover with her the fantastic vegan recipes that exist.

In addition, she gives you culinary and beauty tips and talks about the importance of sustainable development.

Best online stores for vegans

It is becoming easier to find products suitable for vegans. Many of the brands are expanding their catalog with plant-based alternatives, so simply going to a standard supermarket could serve you well, but in case you want a specialized site, here are some of the best.

My Vegan Shop

In Mi Tienda Vegana, one of the leading online stores in veganism, you will find everything: from vegan liquors, to protein supplements, all kinds of food products, household cleaning products without animal testing and even vegan feed and lotions for your pets.

Within the food they have several types of cheeses, cold meats, prawns, tempeh, pâtés, egg substitutes and more so that you can choose from a wide range what you like the most.

vegan food

Veggie Room

Veggie Room is a small business in Madrid that also has an online store. In any of the options you will be able to buy 100% vegetable products and free of animal exploitation.

You will find plenty of vegan products including vegetable meats, frozen foods, ready meals, pasta, bread, vegan food for pets and much more. They usually have weekly sales on certain products that they buy in large quantities wholesale so that the retail consumer can benefit from the best price. They deliver your orders in about 24-48 hours.

vegaffinity

In this online store we find all kinds of products, not only food products such as vegan meats, prepared products, frozen products, vegetable drinks, or supplements, but also personal hygiene and vegan cosmetics.

They have a curious subscription plan called Vegaffinity Premium in which you can buy products with a 10% discount and free shipping and you will also have access to a multitude of vegan video recipes every week to follow a healthy and balanced diet.
